title.description: Display title for the appointment (usually client name or meeting description)

start.description: Appointment start time with timezone offset

end.description: Appointment end time with timezone offset

duration.description: Total duration of the appointment in minutes

price.description: Price of the service in dollars (or base currency)

client_id.description: Unique identifier for the client associated with this appointment
client_id.note: Null for non-client appointments like meetings or reminders

staff_id.description: Unique identifier for the staff member assigned to this appointment

service_id.description: Unique identifier for the service being performed

fields.name: Service display name
fields.color: Color code/theme number for calendar display

appointment_service_id.description: Unique identifier linking this appointment to a specific service instance

base_appointment_service_id.description: Reference to the original appointment service if this is a modification or add-on

recurring_appointment_id.description: Identifier linking this appointment to a recurring series

client_message.description: Message or notes from the client when booking

staff_requested.description: Whether the client specifically requested this staff member

is_new_client.description: Indicates if this is the client's first appointment

guest_number.description: Number of additional guests for this appointment

finish_duration.description: Additional time needed to complete/finish the service (in minutes)

post_staff_duration.description: Buffer time after appointment for staff cleanup/preparation (in minutes)

post_client_duration.description: Buffer time after appointment for client (in minutes)

editable.description: Whether this appointment can be edited in the UI

durationEditable.description: Whether the duration can be modified

abilities.description: Permission flags for actions that can be performed on this appointment

service_option_ids.description: List of selected service options/add-ons for this appointment

resource_ids.description: List of resources (rooms, equipment) assigned to this appointment

effective_tag_ids.description: Tags/labels associated with this appointment for categorization

hex_color.description: Custom hex color code for calendar display
hex_color.note: Empty string means use default theme color

className.description: CSS class name for styling the appointment in calendar view
className.note: Used for color theming (theme-1 through theme-13+)

booked_by_client_full_name.description: Full name of the person who booked the appointment (if different from client)

usage_notes.time_calculations: Total blocked time = duration + finish_duration + post_staff_duration + post_client_duration
usage_notes.client_appointments: Appointments with client_id are client services. Null client_id indicates internal meetings/tasks/reminders
usage_notes.service_appointments: Appointments with service_id are billable services. Null service_id indicates non-service events
usage_notes.recurring_logic: All appointments in a series share the same recurring_appointment_id
usage_notes.color_priority: hex_color takes precedence over className theme colors if provided
usage_notes.state_workflow: Typical flow: booked → confirmed → completed (or cancelled/no_show)
